meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of pantheism.
meanings.sent1: The pantheistical view sees divinity in all things.
meanings.sent2: She embraced a pantheistical philosophy that connected her to nature.
meanings.sent3: The pantheistical approach to spirituality made him appreciate the beauty in everything.
meanings.sent4: Her pantheistical beliefs painted the world in a new light.
meanings.sent5: The pantheistical perspective allowed her to find wonder in the smallest details.

meanings.definition: Believing in or worshiping all gods.
meanings.sent1: Their pantheistical faith honored a multitude of deities.
meanings.sent2: The pantheistical rituals included offerings to various gods.
meanings.sent3: In their pantheistical ceremonies, they celebrated the diversity of divine beings.
meanings.sent4: The pantheistical devotion extended to gods from different mythologies.
meanings.sent5: Their pantheistical prayers encompassed a wide array of divine figures.
